metadata.title: CVE-2014-3875 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The addto parameter to fup in Frams' Fast File EXchange (F*EX, aka fex)before fex-2014053 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting(XSS) attacks

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3875` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fex - 20140530-1
fex-utils - 20140530-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fex package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20140530-1').
